p:
RNA was extracted from plasma specimens on the m2000sp instrument (Abbott Molecular Diagnostics, Des Plaines, IL, USA). A 676 nucleotide region of the HIV env immunodominant region (IDR), a 1009 nucleotide region of the HIV pol integrase (IN), and/or a 750 nucleotide region of the HCV 5â€²UTR-core region was amplified by RT-PCR for sequencing by Sanger methods as previously described
33, 34 . The Genbank accession numbers for the pol IN sequences are MN697000-MN697738, the env IDR sequences are MN378645-MN379312, and the HCV 5UTR- core sequences are MN697739-MN698236.
